mapper.insert: insert into purchase ( PURCHASE_NUM, PURCHASE_DATE, PURCHASE_PRICE, DELIVERY_ADDR, DELIVERY_ADDR_DETAIL, DELIVERY_POST, DELIVERY_PHONE, MESSAGE, PURCHASE_STATUS, MEMBER_NUM) values (#{purchaseNum}, sysdate(), #{purchasePrice}, #{deliveryAddr}, #{deliveryAddrDetail}, #{deliveryPost}, #{deliveryPhone}, #{message}, "결제완료", #{memberNum})
insert into purchase_list (goods_num, PURCHASE_NUM, PURCHASE_QTY, GOODS_UNIT_PRICE) values (#{goodsNum}, #{purchaseNum}, #{purchaseQty}, #{goodsUnitPrice})
